msbt.message: I felt like getting some extra stretches in, so I'm up early today.Gotta get everything warmed up, y'know? I've got a lot of workouts planned for the day!
I just kinda sprang awake a bit ago. Figured since I was up, I may as well jog around the island, !
I woke up to a mega leg crampI'm guessing it was the thousand squats I did yesterday.I probably just wasn't drinking enough water. Well, at least my legs are getting buff, !
Whoa, what time is it? I totally lost track! Guess I was working out too hardas if that's possible!
I know it's late, but I'm wide awake right now. Did I just not work out enough today, ?
I'm way too pumped to sleep right now. Think I'm just gonna do crunches till I crash.
